ygData.subject: I'm Gonna make you love me
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Sorry about putting a song into this post, but after listneing to the song, it reminded me of Bluestreak and Andromeda. ... he walked into the room::

OOC: Sorry about putting a song into this post, but after listneing to the 
song, it reminded me of Bluestreak and Andromeda.

:::Andromeda/Bluestreak/Calibos/Ratchet/Sideswipe:::

::Bluestreak had moved out of his quarters, deciding to stay with Andromeda.  
he walked into the room::
Bluestreak: Id like to show you something
::He takes out something that resembles a CD player::
Andromeda: What is it?
Bluestreak: Its something the humans used to use to listen to music, want to 
hear one?
Andromeda: Id love to
::He plays a song that went something like this::

Well, the world never ends
Yeah its only the beginning
and we cant pretend
to discover its meaning
We talked for hours at a time
and i came to my senses
your more than a friend
Your my perfect lover
I'll never be all you want me too but thats alright
cause I'm gonna make you love me
I'm gonna dry your tears
and were gonna stay together for a million years
Its the least i can do
just to make you my baby
no words can describe
oh pinch me im dreaming
your hair's long and black
as you lay 'cross my pillow
when i stare in your eyes
I get lost in your glory
I'll never be all you want me to but thats alright
Cause im gonna make you love me
I'm gonna dry your tears
and were gonna stay together for a million years
And the river it bends
but it flows to the ocean
baby here i am
i'm your sea of devotion
I'll never be all you want me to but thats alright
Cause I'm gonna make you love me
I'm gonna dry your tears
and were gonna stay together for a million years

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
::Ratchet lets Calibos in::
Ratchet: Whats your name?
Calibos: um, uh, Bunfold
::Ratchet raises an eyebrow.  Strange name::
Ratchet: Uh, okay Bunfold, welcome to the Maximals.  Wow, weve been getting a 
lot of new members
Calibos: Like who?
Ratchet: Some Femme named Andromeda
Calibos: Nice name...
Ratchet: Uh, right
::He somehow didnt like the look of this guy::
Calibos: Do you have any free quarters?
Ratchet: Yep
Calibos: Gooood.
::Calibos found some quarters and layed down on his bed.  All was going 
according to plan::
